snippet: Seventy-five years ago, the Museum of Modern Art presented its first solo photography exhibition, a show of pictures by Walker Evans titled “American Photographs.”
lead_paragraph: Seventy-five years ago, the Museum of Modern Art presented its first solo photography exhibition, a show of pictures by Walker Evans titled “American Photographs.”

headline.main: Let Us Now Praise a Pioneering Show
headline.print_headline: Let Us Now Praise A Pioneering Show
